summary: The document is a restricted report from the JFK Assassination System Identification Form, detailing an investigation into Robert Scheer's employment at the City University of New York in July 1961. It includes information about his employment as a Lecturer in the Summer Session, his salary, and the reason for leaving, which was the end of the term. The report lacks some personal details like date and place of birth and concludes with no additional pertinent information found, along with the special agent's details. The document was released with deletions on 03/07/95.
key_findings: Robert Scheer was employed as a Lecturer in the Summer Session at City University of New York from 20 June 1960 to 12 August 1960.
His salary was $288 for the summer term.
The reason for leaving was the end of the term.
No additional pertinent information about Robert Scheer was found.
The document was released with deletions on 03/07/95.
